ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 onion, sliced', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '125ml vegetable stock', '1 ear sweetcorn, kernels cut from cob', '250g sliced yellow courgette', '250g sliced courgette', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons butter', 'salt and pepper to taste']
